"That is not dead which can eternal lie, And with strange aeons, even death may die."


Astaroth's Domain is best viewd at 1024 x 768 display resolution with MS Explore 4+

- Warning -

The following web site is a compilation of various documents most of which are of unknown origin. The Reader should be aware that they describe visions about a world that can be dangerous to his/her own sanity.

Members of the Cult of The Dead should not ever try the rituals contained within the following pages without being fully aware of the risks they represent.
